thread.title: Park Hyatt Vienna opens the largest suite in Austria
thread.title_full: Park Hyatt Vienna opens the largest suite in Austria

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Park Hyatt Vienna opens the largest suite in Austria
text:
Park Hyatt Vienna opens the largest suite in Austria Park Hyatt Vienna opens the largest suite in Austria Details Category: Hotel   10:00 The hotel’s Royal Penthouse Suite boasts over 820 square meters of living space and four roof terraces Just a year after opening, Park Hyatt Vienna proudly presents another jewel of the Am Hof square - the largest suite in Austria! Boasting 820 square metres of living space distributed over two levels, guests are treated to stunning views over the Austrian capital from four out-door terraces. The Royal Penthouse Suite can be hired as accommodation for a family break, or even as a spacious venue for a special event or celebration. 
Unique luxury and stylish ambience on two levels Spread over the fifth and sixth floors of the hotel and connected by a beautiful onyx stairway, the Royal Penthouse Suite offers guests a spacious living and dining area, three kitchens, four bathrooms, its own gym, a walk-in closet, a family room and an office. The two bedrooms (with the possible addition of two more) can accommodate between seven and ten people. The light-drenched rooms are fitted with high-quality materials and stylish furniture; leaving nothing to be desired with regards to technical equipment. ￼ Ample roof windows offer unique views over Am Hof, St. Stephen's Cathedral, the Michaelerkuppel, Vienna City Hall, St. Peter's Church and many other impressive buildings in the city’s first district. The connected leafy terraces with uninterrupted views all the way to the Viennese vineyards invite guests to relax, linger and enjoy the privacy this exclusive suite provides. ￼￼ Whatever the event - a birthday party, a wedding or a business meeting – the Royal Penthouse Suite is designed for up to 80 people; so the possibilities are almost limitless and appeal to private individuals and business people alike. Park Hyatt Vienna’s Director General, Monique Dekker stated “The largest suite in Austria, with its unique views of Vienna and breath-taking interior, is available as an accommodation option for our local and international guests and promises to turn any stay into an unforgettable experience.” Nightly rates staying in the ‘Royal Penthouse Suite’ start from EUR 19,800/ £ 14,478* per night including breakfast and VAT.
